transcript.title: Reappointment of Secretaries to the Attorney General's Department and the Department of Education, Science and Training
transcript.content:
I am pleased to announce that I have reappointed Mr Robert Cornall AO as Secretary of the Attorney-General's Department and Ms Lisa Paul PSM as Secretary of the Department of Education, Science and Training.

Having received a report from the Secretary of my department, as required by the Public Service Act 1999, I have reappointed Mr Cornall and Ms Paul for terms of three years commencing on 26 October 2007.

I express my appreciation of the contribution made by Mr Cornall and Ms Paul.
